text: Raymond Phillip "Ray" De Gruchy (born 18 May 1932) was a professional footballer from Jersey who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Guernsey footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Burton Albion F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people
title: Ray De Gruchy
